column5: My daughter and son-in-law surprised the heck out of me the other day by buying me a Lowrance HDS-5 fishfiner/GPS combo for a combined Father's Day/B'day present  Now, I'm wondering what type of Navionics card should I buy????......I mainly fish the Ottawa R, Big Rideau Lakes, Temagami, Nippissing and Quinte.....is there a card that covers these waterways???  Thanks......
this will give you everything you need  http://www.navionics.com/NewLakes.asp
